mapper.insert: INSERT INTO st_newuser_hour (year, month, day, hour, appkey, datehour, newuser) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{hour}, #{appkey}, #{datehour}, #{newuser,jdbcType=BIGINT})
INSERT INTO st_newuser_day (year, month, day, appkey, date, dayofweek, newuser) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{appkey}, #{date}, #{dayofweek}, #{newuser,jdbcType=BIGINT})
INSERT INTO st_newuser_week (year, week, appkey, fromdate, todate, newuser) VALUES (#{year}, #{week}, #{appkey}, #{fromdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{todate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{newuser,jdbcType=BIGINT})
INSERT INTO st_newuser_month (year, month, appkey, newuser) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{appkey}, #{newuser,jdbcType=BIGINT})
